analysis.description: SMILE.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x29af0749c6aeb5a45708a09ad432101e222ee4e4.sol#215-224) is declared view but contains assembly code
empty in SMILE.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x29af0749c6aeb5a45708a09ad432101e222ee4e4.sol#112-114) is a local variable never initialiazed

SMILE.retrieveERC (/unique_contracts/0x29af0749c6aeb5a45708a09ad432101e222ee4e4.sol#241-250) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-interfaceProvider.transfer(msg.sender,interfaceProvider.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_contracts/0x29af0749c6aeb5a45708a09ad432101e222ee4e4.sol#249-250)

SMILE.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x29af0749c6aeb5a45708a09ad432101e222ee4e4.sol#215-224)
	- /unique_contracts/0x29af0749c6aeb5a45708a09ad432101e222ee4e4.sol#219-221
